values: Serious Joy, Cultural Conflict, and Christian Humility: Thoughts on Christian EducationSerious Joy, Cultural Conflict, and Christian Humility: Thoughts on Christian Education

True Christian education fills our hearts and minds with a joy so serious and strong that our society loses its power to control where we stand and what we say.True Christian education fills our hearts and minds with a joy so serious and strong that our society loses its power to control where we stand and what we say.
